#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return a;
	else
		return gcd(b, a%b);
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(0);
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		long long int aodd,aeven,bodd,beven,den=n*m,num;
		if(n%2!=0)
		{
			aodd=(n/2)+1;
			aeven=n/2;
		}
		else
		{
			aodd=n/2;
			aeven=n/2;
		}
		if(m%2!=0)
		{
			bodd=(m/2)+1;
			beven=m/2;
		}
		else
		{
			bodd=m/2;
			beven=m/2;
		}
		num=(aeven*bodd)+(beven*aodd);
		long long int div=gcd(num,den);
		cout<<num/div<<"/"<<den/div<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
